note.p: Birth: St Stephen's, Coleman Street, London (c 1693)
Education: Clare College, Cambridge. BA (1714). Sidney Sussex College, Cambridge. MA (1717)
Career: Ordained deacon (1717); Rector of Foot's Cray, Kent (1725-1747)
Proposers: Sir Hans Sloane; Martin Folkes; John Hadley
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Venn; DNB (father's entry)
